## Featured Projects

Includes two of my projects completed through the MGMT 230 course. Skills demonstrated include: technical acumen, statistical analysis, data interpretation and visualization, and professional compilation.

### Sample Work

Example of a Generated Visualization:
```{r sample-viz, echo=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=5}

library(ggplot2)

business_data <- read.csv("business_performance.csv")

# Generating a Scatter Plot
ggplot(business_data, aes(x = customers, y = revenue, color = channel)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  labs(title = "Customer Count vs Revenue by Channel",
       x = "Number of Customers", y = "Revenue ($)")
```
